title: Spreading the word on infectious disease control (University of Bristol)
text: ( Source : University of Bristol ) On 2 November , the University will host the second Elizabeth Blackwell Annual Public Lecture, entitled 'When pathogens meet people: controlling infectious disease epidemics'. The lecture will be given by
